message: You arrive at a hidden stronghold where resistance members gather.

options.message: The resistance leaders welcome you and the rescued knight.
The armory catches the corner of your eye. you decide to stop by.

message: The leaders reveal their plan to overthrow the corrupt king.

message: In the armory you meet one of the resistance leaders and have a chat, telling them about your quest. The resistance leader offers you one of the finest pieces of equipment known in exchange for joining their final battle.
